item.title: Defer
item.description: Go语言Defer Return 返回值执行顺序探究 defer之间的执行顺序 go 的 defer 语句是用来延迟执行函数的关键字 package main import "fmt" func defers(a int) int { defer func() { fmt.Println("Defer 1...") }() defer func() { fmt.Println("Defer 2...") }()
